page.para: Our fa/vour/ite friend helps us all. Can you guess who he is?
Our fa/vour/ite friend is Ox/tail Bird. He is such a help/ful friend!
I am Rhi/no. I get mad when there are fleas on my skin.
Ox/tail Bird eats all the fleas. He is my fa/vour/ite friend!
I am Croc/o/dile. I feel bad be/cause I can’t brush my teeth.
Ox/tail Bird pecks my teeth clean. He is my fa/vour/ite friend!
I am Gi/raffe. I am sad when I can’t scratch my head.
Ox/tail Bird can reach just the right spot. He is my fa/vour/ite friend!
Ox/tail Bird is dif/fer/ent from all of us. We have four legs but he has two wings.
Ox/tail Bird is our fa/vour/ite friend. We love it when he sings!
